attributes.action: Demand for Exile/Deportation of MQM founder Altaf Hussain from England
attributes.additional_details:
The millions of Pakistanis across the globe demand that England stop providing a safe haven to Altaf Hussain, the founder of Mutahidda Qaumi Movement in Pakistan. Altaf Hussain has been involved in extensive terrorist acts and crimes in Pakistan and has over three thousand cases of corruption against him in Pakistan.

His latest act of threatening to slay and murder peaceful Pakistani protesters on May 12, 2013 in Karachi Teen Talwar Chowk area on national television is deplorable and is against fundamental human rights of freedom of speech.

Pakistanis across the globe demand that Altaf Hussain be exiled out of England as we expect the English government to uphold fundamental human rights and not provide a safe haven to a criminal.
